department: Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) - Department of National Defence (DND)
short_summary: Request for Proposal: Purchase 2 ISU90 Military Shipping Containers
description: Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), on behalf of the Department of National Defence is issuing this request for proposal (RFP) for the acquisition of two ISU90 military shipping containers including delivery in Alouette, Quebec, Canada.
full_summary:
### Military Shipping Container Tender Announcement
#### Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC)

**Tender Reference:** WS4063256226
**Contract Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
**Publication Date:** August 9, 2023

**Background:** The Department of National Defence has a requirement for two ISU90 military shipping containers, including delivery to Alouette, Québec, Canada.

**Delivery of Tender Documents:** Tender documents can be accessed through the Ariba Discovery platform at [insert URL].

**Evaluation Process:** Proposals will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

**Trade Agreements:** This tender is subject to the Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Regions of Delivery:** The delivery of the shipping containers will be to Alouette, Québec, Canada.

**Contracting Entity:** Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC)
#### Contact Information:
* Name: Francois S. Martineau
* Email: [francois.s.martineau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:francois.s.martineau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Phone (not provided)

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding

**Important Dates:** 
* Tender Closing Date: September 7, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT
* Expected Contract Start Date: August 31, 2023

**Disclaimer:** The contract may be cancelled at any time at the discretion of PWGSC. 

Please note that any queries should be directed to Francois S. Martineau.

**Document Category:** Goods and Services
**UNSPC Classification:**
* 24112400 (Storage chests and cabinets and trunks)
* 24112800 (Freight containers)
* 24112900 (Crates)

Please contact Francois S. Martineau ([francois.s.martineau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:francois.s.martineau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)) with any questions or inquiries.
